metadata.title: CVE-2021-26948 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Null pointer dereference in the htmldoc v1.9.11 and before may allowattackers to execute arbitrary code and cause a denial of service via acrafted html file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-26948` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

htmldoc - 1.9.2-1ubuntu0.2+esm1
htmldoc-common - 1.9.2-1ubuntu0.2+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: htmldoc package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.2-1ubuntu0.2+esm1').
